text: I believe that in the future the very
words traffic accident traffic jam will

English
by 2020 intelligence will be everywhere
not just in the car or the roads but
practically in every object scientists
call it ubiquitous computing
what's ahead in terms of ubiquitous
computing is pretty inevitable when you
look at the last three decades the 80s
the decade of the microprocessor
symbolized by the personal computer that
was a decade in which we built our
computers the 90s the decade of networks
and communications symbolized by the
World Wide Web was when we connected our
computers together in this decade it's
computing that's everywhere connected to
everything and embedded in everything
and you'll know that ubiquitous
computing z' arrived when you realize
computers have become invisible already
we have computers in our phones TV sets
stereos wristwatches and our dishwashers
but in the future in the future
computers will move even deeper into the
very fabric of our lives in just a few
years basic microchips will be so cheap
they could be built into every product
we buy an invisible intelligent network
hidden in our walls our furniture even
our clothing
